title: Incorrect artwork
subTitle: The original file contains incorrectly written words or was uploaded by accident
action: Compare the customer's photo with the customer's uploaded file associated with their order. Check if the design mistake is already there

question.action: Check the log in the DTP tab. Search for a green update, these are the DTP warnings.

solution.title: Incorrect artwork
solution.action:
File the complaint in Presta
Request a fixed file from Prepress

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The agent altered something in the design that they should not have. No warning was sent so the customer could not have known. We can reprint or refund.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description: We have identified that an alteration was made to your design by our agent, which should not have occurred, and no warning was sent, leaving you unaware of the change. To resolve this, we can offer you a discount or arrange a reprint at no additional cost. If there isn't enough time for a reprint, we can also provide a refund. Please let us know which option you prefer, and we will ensure it is promptly addressed to your satisfaction.

question.text: What type of order is this?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Incorrect artwork
solution.action:
File complaint in Presta
Select one of the following resolutions based on customer type

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Our manual artwork team had to make a change to the design in order for it to be print ready. We warned the customer of any changes so we can't validate the complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a new customer, we understand that you may not be fully aware of our processes. Our manual artwork team made necessary changes to your design to ensure it was print-ready, and we provided a warning about these changes. Therefore, we cannot validate the complaint. However, as a gesture of goodwill and to ensure your satisfaction, we can offer you a reprint with the corrected file at no additional cost. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this option, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: As a returning customer, we appreciate your loyalty and want to clarify our process. Our manual artwork team made necessary changes to your design to ensure it was print-ready, and we provided a warning about these changes. Therefore, we cannot validate the complaint. However, to demonstrate our commitment to your satisfaction, we are offering a 10% discount on your current order or a voucher for a future purchase. Please let us know your preference, and we will ensure it is promptly applied.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded

question.text: What type of order is this?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, amount of orders total, amount of prior complaints, amount spent total, purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

solution.title: Incorrect artwork
solution.action:
File complaint in Presta
Select one of the following resolutions based on customer type

questions.title: Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: During the artwork check we only look for technical errors, a incorrect design or typo is not checked and so can not be validated.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: As a new customer, we understand that you may not be fully aware of our processes. During our artwork check, we focus solely on technical errors and do not review the content for design or text errors. However, as a special consideration, we can offer you a reprint if you provide us with a corrected file. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this option, and we will make the necessary arrangements to ensure your satisfaction.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description: As a returning customer, we value your continued business and want to clarify our processes. During our artwork check, we focus solely on technical errors and do not review the content for design or text errors. As a result, we cannot validate issues related to these aspects. However, to ensure your satisfaction, we can offer you a 10% discount, which can be applied either to your current order or as a voucher for a future purchase. Please let us know your preference, and we will make the necessary arrangements.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Wrong artwork uploaded
